http://www.samurai-archives.com/contact.html

The problem here is that the answer to all the questions is either;

1. We cannot help you

or

2. Ask the Yahoo Samurai History list...

Perhaps we can help our very dedicated Webmaster to post some of the 
basics like what is a samurai (bushi), what is (was) Bushido?The 
answers being "read the article on death in the culture section" or 
some such. Clearly we cannot save all the unfortunates out there but, 
"though they be innumerable we must vow to save them all..."

-t
